CustomField.formula: IF( MSIL_Application_Status_Code__c == '340017', 'CANCELED', IF( MSIL_Application_Status_Code__c == '340012', 'RE_UPLOAD_DOCUMENT',IF( MSIL_Application_Status_Code__c == '340004' , 'REJECTED',IF( MSIL_Application_Status_Code__c == '340003' , 'SANCTIONED',IF(MSIL_Application_Status_Code__c == '340002', 'UNDER_PROCESS',IF( MSIL_Application_Status_Code__c == '340005' , 'DISBURSED',''))))))
CustomField.label: Application Status
